name: Word of Mouth
description:
Word of Mouth is a game where you try and start a revolution. You start with no one supporting your cause, but through conversation with others you hope to convince them of your great idea.

How to play:

  • Walk up to someone and match the arrows to get them to join your cause
  • Get the required number of supporters to the goal to proceed

Controls:

  • WASD/Arrow Keys - Move
  • Space - Rally supporters

Made in 72 hours in Godot 3.1 for Ludum Dare #45: You start with nothing
